body:
Hello all people of Avicus!

Now, first I want to say that this is my first forum that I plan being active on, so this is very exciting for me to meet new people :D. Ive been playing Minecraft for about 3 years now and most of my time on Avicus/MC Zone's Nebula has been amazing! The reason I say most is because I have been a real jerk, and an idiot  to some people (Of who I can't remember which makes me feel even more bad). For that, I want to apologize to anyone I've hurt. I may have been in a bad mood, I may have been depressed, but that is no reason for me to take it out on other people. So for being offensive, rude, disrespectful, and anything else, I apologize.

About Me

My name is Luke, your average 14 year old nerd who loves Minecraft. I'm pretty good at Sword PvP (With Fishing Rods, please add!) but I suck with a Bow. I love Minecraft as a game, and as a place for me to unwind and just talk with all the nice people on Avicus.

Bad Stuff

I Haven Been Banned! Yes, I have been banned (Perm) once due to greifing. I did actually greif, but It was my friend who got me banned. I regret doing things like that to the people in that server but I have changed and tried to become a better person :).

And A Bunch of Random Stuff

I'm really short for my age, I like sushi, I'm S. Korean, UNICORNS (Yes it must be in caps) are awesome, Everyone should have a Banana ready to go if a Giant Lizard were to ever attack, and in general, I'm just a weird person.

I'm so excited to talk with and meet you all and wish you Happy Avicus-ing (It should be a word)

See ya around :)
xXiGetDiamondsXx

replies.body:
1) Whats your (full) name?
2) How old are you?
3) Whats your Birthday?
4) What starsign does that make it?
5) Whats your favourite colour?
6) Whats your lucky number?
7) Do you have any pets?
8) Where are you from?
9) How tall are you?
10) What shoe size are you?
11) How many pairs of shoes do you own?
12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make?
13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have?
14) and what would your hero name be?
15) and what outfit would you wear?
16) What was your last dream about?
17) What would you do if you won the lottery?
18) Would you like to build/design your own house?
19) Which form of public transport do you prefer?
20) What talents do you have?
21) Can you juggle?
22) Can you solve a rubix cube?
23) Do you have a cherished childhood teddybear?
24) Are you psychic in any way?
25) Are you a good dancer?
26) Are you a good singer?
27) Are you a good cook?
28) Are you a good artist?
29) Are you a good listener?



If you finish all these questions, i'll give you the rest. (that is only 29/800) :D
